meanings.definition: The quality or state of being protrusive.
meanings.sent1: Her protrusiveness made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The protrusiveness of the tree roots created a tripping hazard.
meanings.sent3: The cat's protrusiveness as it reached for the toy was both cute and funny.
meanings.sent4: The protrusiveness of the mountain peak against the sky was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The protrusiveness of the neon sign made it impossible to miss in the dark.

meanings.definition: The act of protruding or thrusting forward.
meanings.sent1: The sudden protrusiveness of the snake startled me.
meanings.sent2: His protrusiveness in the argument made his point clear.
meanings.sent3: The protrusiveness of the balloon as it flew around the room was comical.
meanings.sent4: The protrusiveness of the rocket as it launched into space was awe-inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The protrusiveness of the branch reaching towards the sunlight was a beautiful sight.
